thread.title: Realising the value of contextual knowledge
thread.title_full: Realising the value of contextual knowledge

title: Realising the value of contextual knowledge
text:
When examining your customer service processes to improve satisfaction, it is important to remember that technology alone will not produce your desired results. Knowledge is an ever-changing entity, you must create a culture that supports your initiatives beginning at the very top of your organisation. 
Improving customer satisfaction while containing costs is the ultimate success for almost every customer service organisation. A new Gartner report looks at how contextual knowledge management can offer critical benefits for gains in satisfaction and productivity. 
  read more.
